      • matches

        public static boolean matches(java.lang.Object object,
              java.lang.Class klass,
              int iterations,
              java.lang.String match,
              java.lang.String... ignoreField)
        Returns true if any attribute in the item matches the given constraints
        Parameters:
        object - the object you want to match
        klass - the class to get the fields from (in most cases you'll just call object.getClass())
        iterations - how many inherited levels you want to check fields for
        match - the String to match fields against
        ignoreField - fieldNames you wish to ignore, you can give as many as you like, you can also give an array of strings
        Returns:
        whether the given object contained fields which matched the given string

      • isPrimitive

        public static boolean isPrimitive(java.lang.Class c)
        Checks first whether it is primitive and then whether it's wrapper is a primitive wrapper. Returns true if either is true
        Parameters:
        c - the class to check whether it's primitive
        Returns:
        whether it's a primitive type itself or it's a wrapper for a primitive type
